paper_abstract: This paper presents a novel approach to Sentiment Polarity Classification in Twitter posts, by extracting a vector of weighted nodes from the graph of WordNet. These weights are used in SentiWordNet to compute a final estimation of the polarity. Therefore, the method proposes a non-supervised solution that is domain-independent. The evaluation of a generated corpus of tweets shows that this technique is promising. (C) 2013 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Ranked Word Net graph for Sentiment Polarity Classification in Twitter
